LABEL.CHANGE_EMAIL_HINT: When the user joins this workspace with the new email, all assets from the previous email will be automatically transferred to the new one.

MESSAGE.DEACTIVATE_USER_CONFIRM: User will temporarily lose their access to workspace. Are you sure?
MESSAGE.DELETE_INVITATION_CONFIRM: Email {{ email }} will no longer be invited to the workspace. Are you sure?
MESSAGE.EMAIL_DUPLICATION: Email already existed. Please type another one
MESSAGE.EMAIL_EXIST: This account already exists on system
MESSAGE.INVITE_EXPIRATION: To keep your workspace secured, make sure to set an expiration date for invitation
MESSAGE.UNTRANSFERED_ASSETS_CONFIRM: Before deleting users, you should transfer their ownership of collections and documents.
